forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 12C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 56F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low 43F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds N at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 57F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 41F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 51F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 52F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
